page.title: 14RECREATION - Horse Riding
page.content: An interview was held with a girl from Brierton School who keeps horses in the area. She has 5 horses ranging from 2 years old to 15 years old. They include one thoroughbred, two Welsh horses and one which was bought in foal. Next to the field where she keeps them is an indoor riding centre (beside Three Gates Farm). The centre was built in the mid 1970's and holds monthly competitions in jumping and dressage during the winter. Up to 100 riders use the centre although its popularity has declined with the growth of other centres in the region.The Pony Club, the Saddle Club and private individuals are all involved in its organisation and one Junior International who lives nearby uses it often
